== Details ==

Main topics of study:
  * 3D Editor
  * Raytracing
  * Dropped shadows
  * Soft shadows
  * Illumination models
  * Phong shading
  * Antialiasing
  * Animation
  * Spheres, Cubes, Planes, Cylinders
